author: dblevins
msg: "fix the openejb2 m2 pluginMangement, pick up the latest codehaus repos and to use the 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT of the xmlbeans plugin"

author: djencks
msg: make the m2 build work a little better, use org.openejb groupId rather than openejb to avoid collisions with m1 build artifacts, and change some wadi dependencies to available versions (might break wadi)

author: dblevins
msg: Patch from Jason Dillon to allow stan to publish via webdav

author: dain
msg: Added missing call to the CMP1 bridge before load and after store.
Moved CMP1 bridge code underneath the EjbCmpEngine interface, which The simplifies the cmp container.
EjbRunAsInterceptor was always setting the runAsSubject into the next caller even when it was null.
Added temporary hack to delay a failure due to finder methods without ejbql until the finder is actually called.

author: dain
msg: When looking up a deployment by deployment id in the JndiRequestHandler we need to use the req.getRequestString() directly instead of the local jndiName variable because the name has the leading '/' character removed and this leading '/' is needed by the abstract name query.
